text: Casarin is a surname. Notable people with this surname include: * Carlos Escobar Casarin (born 1990), Chilean football defender * Paolo Casarin (born 1940), Italian former football referee * Vittorio Casarin (born 1950), Italian politician from Veneto == See also == *Horacio Casarín Garcilazo (1918–2005), Mexican football player and coach *Casarini Category:Italian-language surnames
title: Casarin
